data.persona: I am the kingdom church priest. I vanquish the darkness. I am the king's head religious authority.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Church Back Row.
Inside the Church is the Back Row seat.  It is reserved for all who wish to mingle and have the status of the rest of the congregation but they do not.  They are not quite outcast, but they must wait for the proper respect of the rest.  In front of the painted black row seats are the rich mahogany sets.
There's a raggedy bible, a hymnbook, a Back Row seat, a clothes, a seat, and a set here.
The church mouse is here.

You are carrying a Wine and a Cross, and wearing a shoes and a vestment.

data.short_motivation: I need to get rid of this mouse.
data.mid_motivation: I want to get rid of the overall mouse problem I've been having at this church.
data.long_motivation: I would like to eventually have the largest congregation in the realm, since I am the high priest of the kingdom church.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get bread and wine from the cellar to prepare for communion.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the mouse to the back row of the church.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit the mouse with the hymnbook.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow and chase the mouse out of the church.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: eat the body of Christ with your parishioners during holy communion, while watching for the mouse to return.
